verses.name: Luke 1:13
verses.text: But the angel said unto him, Fear not, Zacharias: for thy prayer is heard; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son, and thou shalt call his name John.

verses.name: Luke 1:14
verses.text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness; and many shall rejoice at his birth.

verses.name: Luke 1:15
verses.text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord, and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost, even from his mother’s womb.

verses.name: Luke 1:16
verses.text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God.
